__comment_config: This configuration file is used by build-and-deploy.ps1. Type 'build-and-deploy' in package manage console. To run unicorn: 'build-and-deploy unicorn' or 'unicorn'

config.__comment_msBuildExe: script will look for your msbuild.exe in visualstudio 2017 default path. msBuildExe is a optional fallback value if no msbuild.exe is found
config.__comment__prune: Only use with sitecore 9 due to folder structure. Remove all files under /App_Config/Include and /views except /formbuilder og /shared/ExperienceExplorerView.cshtml. Does not remove folders
